comments.body:
Please add a comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/jimporter/mike/pull/23
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

I've opened a PR to fix the need to manually package the license file (https://github.com/jimporter/mike/pull/23). The comment as a reminder to check the status of this for future updates in the feedstock. Once it's in the source distribution, the local copy can be removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@  license: BSD-3-Clause
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/jimporter/mike/pull/23
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
